Digital Audio Workstations (DAWs)

Some popular DAWs to Explore

  • Ableton Live: Great for live performances and electronic music production.
  • FL Studio: extremely user-friendly interface, ideal for beginners and beat makers.
  • Logic Pro X: very Comprehensive toolset, perfect for Mac users and professionals. I use it. 10/10
  • Pro Tools: Industry standard for recording and mixing, widely used in studios.
  • Cubase: A Versatile DAW with strong MIDI capabilities, suitable for all genres.
